LandingOutcomeDef.letterText: While landing {GRAVSHIP}, a small breach opened in one of the oxygen tanks, venting the entirety of the tank's supply. Until the leak is repaired, the oxygen tank will not work.
While landing {GRAVSHIP}, a power fluctuation caused one of the vac barriers to fail, depressurizing a small section of the ship. It will need to be repaired for it to work again.
An unexpected electromagnetic spike during landing corrupted all of the gravdata collected on this trip.
During {GRAVSHIP}'s landing, a damaged fuel line sprayed astrofuel into the room. A stray spark set it ablaze in a sudden astrofire.
As {GRAVSHIP} descended, its heat signature was spotted by nearby raiders. They've rallied and are moving in to attack before the dust settles.
Shortly after {GRAVSHIP} touched down, swarms of manhunting rats poured out of ventilation shafts across the ship. No one knows how they got in.
While bringing {GRAVSHIP} down, the grav engine's heat control system malfunctioned, causing structural heat to surge far beyond safe limits.
An unexpected gravitic vibration during {GRAVSHIP}â€™s descent shook every component on board, loosening bolts and wearing joints.
